sentence.Network_en: And if they had all accepted, you would have become a bigamist.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她们都答应的话, 那你岂不成为一位“重婚者”吗?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇速记大全+词根+词缀+记忆法_百度文库 ... biennial 两年一次的 bigamist 重婚者 bilabial 双唇的.

entry.def: A bigamist is a person who commits the crime of marrying someone when they are already legally married to someone else.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who marries one person while already legally married to another

auth_sentence.content: Robert Sewell turned out to have been a bigamist.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Robert Sewell turned out to have been a bigamist.
